title: A Thank you to Riot
body: I would like to thank Riot for this marvelous game. As a depression victim, I wasn't very happy at my life. The days I had a gun or the days I had a  blade and said "Today is the day", sometimes depression victims say "What would happen if I waited just one more day?" I found out about League and played it to keep my mind off of the stress and my mental disorder. I turned to  logging  into my favorite game to pass the time. You guys also made me closer to my best friend by sharing laughs and much more through my playing of this game. Thank you for taking my mind off of stress for a year and many years to come, and I cannot thank you for this wonderful relationship you've helped me develop with my now best friend

Like a parrot's resplendent plumage.
/hugs :3
I would like to thank you guys as well. We all have our stories, this helps me pass the time with friends and forget the past. Thank you
Nice change of pace from the ultra negativity on the GD boards. Glad you found something that can help OP.

Gonna agree. There are times when I'm infuriated with league. There are times I wish Hyena Warwick had a tail. There are times when I'd kill for a even-toed ungulate anthro female champion.

But honestly, I like this game. I like the community (You're really not as bad as your rep!) I like the company. Its helped me calm my nerves, its helped me remain stable and far less miserable then I was in the past. I'm not well, but League is a reliable place to return and fall into. Where numerous  mental issues can be put on the wayside. Where I can for a time be happy.

Basically;
Riot, you're alright. You're not perfect. We're all often infuriated with the things you do. But know at least most of us don't take it personally! I mean, seriously. Game development is hard work, harder work with old spaghetti code as your basis.

If I could I would brew you all a cup of tea or something. But have a word of general thanks. Especially too those brave enough to interact with angry fans, like a certain parrot and a Mustache.
I agree!

Wow. Nice job to making it to Gold during preseason already. That's also my goal. To make it to Gold during preseason before rank resets seeing how I failed my goal of getting Gold before season ending.
Thanks! I hope you accomplish your goal~
Thanks, and you're welcome. =P
I don't like that i'm listening to sad music while reading this.

I also want to thank everyone on the riot team. I would like to reiterate what Iron Stylus has to say. I have suffered from depression for about 10 years now have been off and on meds most of my life. I also have chronic generalized anxiety, am victim to constant panic attacks, and have adult ADHD. This game.....this game.....its not an answer, but my goodness, it helps. I don't know why nor do I particularly care to understand in full, but I can get up every morning, for me 5:00pm, and have something to look forward too. I love this game and although there are a lot and I mean a lot of toxic flamers out there, I have also come across some of the nicest people you will ever meet. I have found friends and dare I say family  in this mighty League of Legends. Thank you Riot for giving me a reason to roll out of bed, and for giving me a connection to new friends and family. I love the lore, I love the game, and yes I love the community even the toxic flame, I love you too, so lets all get along and enjoy this wonderful game. Thank you again Riot. Thank you.
Another satisfied customer.
